alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange County through 400 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wallkill, or over Walden, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walden, Gardnertown, Montgomery, Scotchtown, Orange Lake, Washingtonville, Vails Gate, Maybrook, Pine Bush and Bullville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
